trans-unit.source: This lets you take and upload photos.
trans-unit.target: Isso permite tirar fotos e enviá-las.

trans-unit.source: This lets you unlock the app.
trans-unit.target: Isso permite você desbloquear o aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: Websites you visit may request your location.
trans-unit.target: Os sites que visita podem solicitar a sua localização.

trans-unit.source: This lets you take and upload videos.
trans-unit.target: Isto lhe permite fazer e enviar vídeos.

trans-unit.source: This lets you save and upload photos.
trans-unit.target: Isto lhe permite salvar e enviar fotos.

trans-unit.source: This lets you save and upload photos.
trans-unit.target: Isto lhe permite salvar e enviar fotos.

trans-unit.source: Clear your entire browsing session history, passwords, cookies anytime with a single tap.
trans-unit.target: Limpe todo o seu histórico de navegação, senhas e cookies a qualquer momento, com um simples toque.
trans-unit.note: Description for the 'History' panel in the First Run tour.
Title for the third panel 'History' in the First Run tour.
Button to go to the next card in Focus onboarding.

trans-unit.source: Searching for something different? Choose a different search engine.
trans-unit.target: Procurando algo diferente? Escolha um mecanismo de pesquisa diferente.
trans-unit.note: Description for the 'Favorite Search Engine' panel in the First Run tour.
Title for the second panel 'Search' in the First Run tour.
Button to skip onboarding in Focus

trans-unit.source: Take private browsing to the next level. Block ads and other content that can track you across sites and bog down page load times.
trans-unit.target: Leve a navegação privativa ao próximo nível. Bloqueie propagandas e outros conteúdos que podem rastrear você entre os sites e diminuir o tempo de carregamento das páginas.
trans-unit.note: Description for the 'Welcome' panel in the First Run tour.
Title for the first panel 'Welcome' in the First Run tour.
Button on About screen

trans-unit.source: %@ is produced by Mozilla. Our mission is to foster a healthy, open Internet.
trans-unit.target: O %@ é produzido pela Mozilla. Nossa missão é promover uma Internet saudável e aberta.
trans-unit.note: Label on About screen

trans-unit.source: Search and browse right in the app
trans-unit.target: Pesquisar e navegar direto no aplicativo
trans-unit.note: Label on About screen

trans-unit.source: Block trackers (or update settings to allow trackers)
trans-unit.target: Bloquear rastreadores (ou atualizar configurações para permitir rastreadores)
trans-unit.note: Label on About screen

trans-unit.source: Erase to delete cookies as well as search and browsing history
trans-unit.target: Apagar para excluir cookies, bem como o histórico de pesquisa e navegação
trans-unit.note: Label on About screen

trans-unit.source: Use it as a private browser:
trans-unit.note: Label on About screen
Label for row in About screen
Link to Privacy Notice in the About screen
Label for row in About screen

trans-unit.target: Bloquear rastreadores para melhorar a privacidade
trans-unit.note: Label on About screen

trans-unit.source: Block Web fonts to reduce page size
trans-unit.target: Bloquear fontes web para reduzir o tamanho da página
trans-unit.note: Label on About screen

trans-unit.source: Use it as a Safari extension:
trans-unit.target: Usá-lo como uma extensão do Safari:
trans-unit.note: Label on About screen

%@ is the name of the app (Focus / Klar). Title displayed in the settings screen that, when tapped, takes the user to a page with information about the product. Also displayed as a header for the About page.
Label on About screen
%@ is app name. Prompt shown to ask the user to use Touch ID, Face ID, or passcode to continue browsing after returning to the app.
Label for button to add a custom URL
Label for error state when entering an invalid URL
A label displaying an example URL
Label for the input to add a custom URL

trans-unit.target: Adicione e gerencie URLs personalizadas de preenchimento automático.
trans-unit.note: Description for adding and managing custom autocomplete URLs
Label for button taking you to your custom Autocomplete URL list
Title for the default URL list section
Label for toast alerting a custom URL has been added

trans-unit.source: Enable to have %@ autocomplete over 450 popular URLs in the address bar.
trans-unit.target: Habilite o %@ para ter preenchimento automático de mais de 450 URLs populares na barra de endereços.
trans-unit.note: Description for enabling or disabling the default list. The placeholder is replaced with the application name, which can be either Firefox Focus or Firefox Klar.
Label for enabling or disabling autocomplete
Title for the default URL list section
label describing URL Autocomplete as disabled

trans-unit.target: Não há URLs personalizadas para mostrar
trans-unit.note: Label for button to add a custom URL
label describing URL Autocomplete as enabled
Create a new session after failing a biometric check

trans-unit.source: Unlock %@ when re-opening in order to prevent unauthorized access.
trans-unit.target: Desbloquear %@ quando reabrir para prevenir acesso não autorizado.
trans-unit.note: %@ is app name. Explanation for why the app needs access to biometric information. Prompt is only shown once when the user first tries to enable Face ID to open the app.

Button label in external link dialog to cancel the dialog. Test page: https://people-mozilla.org/~bnicholson/test/schemes.html
Button label in mailto: dialog to send an email. Test page: https://people-mozilla.org/~bnicholson/test/schemes.html

Dialog title used for Maps/App Store links. The placeholder is replaced with the application name, which can be either Firefox Focus or Firefox Klar. Test page: https://people-mozilla.org/~bnicholson/test/schemes.html
Button label in App Store URL dialog to open the App Store. Test page: https://people-mozilla.org/~bnicholson/test/schemes.html

Button label in Maps URL dialog to open Maps. Test page: https://people-mozilla.org/~bnicholson/test/schemes.html
Accessibility label for done button in Find in Page Toolbar.
Accessibility label for next result button in Find in Page Toolbar.
Accessibility label for previous result button in Find in Page Toolbar.
Label on button to dismiss first run UI

trans-unit.source: Automatically block online trackers while you browse. Then tap to erase visited pages, searches, cookies and passwords from your device.
trans-unit.target: Bloqueie automaticamente os rastreadores on-line enquanto navega. Em seguida, toque para apagar páginas visitadas, pesquisas, cookies e senhas do seu dispositivo.
trans-unit.note: Message label on the first run screen

trans-unit.target: Navegue como se ninguém estivesse olhando.
trans-unit.note: Message label on the first run screen
Title for the loading screen when the handoff of clipboard delays Focus launch. “Handoff” should not be localized, see https://support.apple.com/HT204681
First label for product description on the home screen
Second label for product description on the home screen
Button label used to close a menu that displays as a popup.
Label in share alert to cancel the alert
Label in share alert to open the URL in Firefox
Label in share alert to open the full system share menu

trans-unit.target: Tocar em Safari e selecionar Bloqueadores de conteúdo

Label for instructions to enable Safari, shown when enabling Safari Integration in Settings
Error label when the blocker is not enabled, shown in the intro and main app when disabled
Label for instructions to enable Safari, shown when enabling Safari Integration in Settings
Save button label

trans-unit.source: That didn't work. Try replacing the search term with this: %s.
trans-unit.note: Label for error state when entering an invalid search engine URL. %s is a search term in a URL.

Text for button to add another search engine in settings with the + prefix

trans-unit.source: Paste or enter search string. If necessary, replace search term with: %s.
trans-unit.target: Colar ou inserir um termo de pesquisa. Se necessário, substituir o termo da pesquisa com: %s.
trans-unit.note: Placeholder text for input of new search engine template
Title for the URL Autocomplete row

trans-unit.source: Blocking other content trackers may break some videos and Web pages.
trans-unit.target: O bloqueio de outros rastreadores pode quebrar alguns vídeos e páginas da Web.
trans-unit.note: Alert message shown when toggling the Content blocker
Button label for declining Content blocker alert
Button label for accepting Content blocker alert

trans-unit.source: Mozilla strives to collect only what we need to provide and improve %@ for everyone.
trans-unit.target: A Mozilla se empenha para coletar somente o que é necessário para melhorar o %@ para todos.
trans-unit.note: Description associated to the Send Usage Data toggle on main screen. %@ is the app name (Focus/Klar)
Subtitle for Send Anonymous Usage Data toggle on main screen
%@ is the name of the app (Focus / Klar). Title displayed in the settings screen that, when tapped, allows the user to leave a review for the app on the app store.
Label for Safari integration section
Title for settings screen
Label for the search engine in the search screen
Title for the search selection screen
Label for Safari integration section
Section label for Mozilla toggles

Header label for security toggles displayed in the settings menu
Label for toggle on main screen

trans-unit.source: Some ads track site visits, even if you don’t click the ads
trans-unit.target: Alguns anúncios rastreiam visitas ao site, mesmo que você não clique nos anúncios
trans-unit.note: Description for 'Block ad Trackers'
Label for toggle on main screen

trans-unit.source: Used to collect, analyze and measure activities like tapping and scrolling
trans-unit.target: Usado para coletar, analisar e medir atividades como tocar e deslizar
trans-unit.note: Description for 'Block analytics Trackers'
Label for toggle on main screen
Label for toggle on main screen

trans-unit.source: Enabling may cause some pages to behave unexpectedly
trans-unit.target: Habilitar pode causar comportamento inesperado em algumas páginas
trans-unit.note: Description for 'Block other content Trackers'
Label for toggle on main screen

trans-unit.source: Embedded on sites to track your visits and to display functionality like share buttons
trans-unit.target: Inserido em sites para rastrear suas visitas e exibir funcionalidades como botões de compartilhamento
trans-unit.note: Description for 'Block social Trackers'

trans-unit.source: Use Face ID to unlock app
trans-unit.target: Utilizar Face ID para desbloquear o aplicativo
trans-unit.note: Label for toggle on settings screen

trans-unit.source: Face ID can unlock %@ if a URL is already open in the app
trans-unit.target: O Face ID pode desbloquear o %@ se uma URL já estiver aberta no aplicativo
trans-unit.note: %@ is the name of the app (Focus / Klar). Description for 'Enable Face ID' displayed under its respective toggle in the settings menu.

trans-unit.source: May break some videos and Web pages
trans-unit.target: Pode quebrar alguns vídeos e páginas web
trans-unit.note: Label subtitle for toggle on main screen

trans-unit.note: Label for toggle on settings screen

trans-unit.source: Touch ID can unlock %@ if a URL is already open in the app
trans-unit.target: O Touch ID pode desbloquear o %@ se uma URL já estiver aberta no aplicativo
trans-unit.note: %@ is the name of the app (Focus / Klar). Description for 'Enable Touch ID' displayed under its respective toggle in the settings menu.
Title for What's new screen
Title for settings section to enable different Siri Shortcuts.
Text for the share menu option when a user wants to open the find in page menu

Text for the share menu option when a user wants to open a page in Firefox but doesn’t have it installed. This string will not wrap in the interface. Instead, it will truncate. To prevent this, please keep the localized string to 18 or fewer characters. If your string runs longer than 18 characters, you can use 'Get Firefox' as the basis for your string. However, if at all possible, we’d like to signal to the user that they will be going to the App Store and installing the application from there. That is why we are using Get and App in the en-US string.
Text for the share menu option when a user wants to open a page in Focus.
Title for the share menu where users can take actions for the current website they are on.
Text for the share menu option when a user wants to reload the site as a desktop
Text for the share menu option when a user wants to open the current website in the Chrome app.
Text for the share menu option when a user wants to open the current website in the Firefox app.
Text for the share menu option when a user wants to open the current website in the Safari app.
Text for the share menu option when a user wants to share the current website they are on through another app.
Button to add a favorite URL to Siri.
Button to add a specified shortcut option to Siri.
Label for button to edit the Siri phrase or delete the Siri functionality.
Title of option in settings to set up Siri to erase
Title of option in settings to set up Siri to erase and then open the app.
Title for screen to add a favorite URL to Siri.
Title of option in settings to set up Siri to open a specified URL in Focus/Klar.
Label for input to set a favorite URL to be opened by Siri.

Text for the context menu when a user has a link on their clipboard.

Text for the context menu when a user wants to copy a link after long pressing it.
Text for the context menu when a user has a link on their clipboard.
